paramFile.description:
Allowed mime types: image/*
Allowed max file size: 1.205 KB
Allowed minimum width is 100px
Allowed minimum height is 300px
Allowed maximum width is 200px
Allowed maximum height is 400px

paramFileOptional.description:
Allowed mime types: application/pdf, image/png, image/jpeg
Allowed max file size: 5 MB
